Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 18th overall pick, by Kansas City in 2016...
Injured on 7/5/2017 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 6 days...

Hit first career homerun on 7/8/2021, off Lamont Pizano (CHI)...
Traded from Kansas City to Chicago on 3/2/2022 (Going to KC: SS George Holl. Going to CHI: C Michael Tuggle)...
Traded from Chicago to Atlanta on 6/20/2022 (Going to ATL: P Jose Raposa, C Michael Tuggle. Going to CHI: C Scott Ebbert)...
Injured on 9/14/2022 with a Broken Finger, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 5/9/2024 with a Sore Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
